Today I joined Republicans & Democrats to avert a government shutdown.

This short-term bill is far from perfect. It leaves out critical funding to secure our border and support for Ukraine‚ÄîI will continue to fight for these Arizona priorities.

But leadership means compromise.

If MAGA extremists in the House force a government shutdown, our troops don‚Äôt get paid.

The brave men and women risking their lives to serve our country deserve better.

Arizona border communities are already overwhelmed, but MAGA extremists want to force a government shutdown that would make Border Patrol agents and officers work without pay.

They're playing political games with dangerous real-world consequences.

I'm working hard to prevent an unnecessary and costly government shutdown.

But many Arizonans have already reached out to my office to ask how a shutdown could impact the benefits and services they rely on.
